mapper.select: select distinct p.PROM_NO, p.PROM_SUB_TYPE, i.ITEM_NAME PROM_SUB_TYPE_NAME, pro1.SHORT_TXT ORG_MATNR, oi.ORIG_NUM ORG_QTY, pro2.SHORT_TXT GIFT_MATNR,gi.GIFT_NUM GIFT_QTY, oi.ITEM_NO, (case when p.PROM_SUB_TYPE = 'Z008' then CONCAT('购买',ROUND(oi.ORIG_NUM),'个',a1.SHORT_TXT,'赠送',ROUND(gi.GIFT_NUM),'个',a2.SHORT_TXT,'产品') when p.PROM_SUB_TYPE = 'Z015' then CONCAT('购买',a1.SHORT_TXT,'满', ci.LOW, '元钱减',oi.DISCOUNT_AMT,'元钱') when p.PROM_SUB_TYPE = 'Z016' then CONCAT('整单满',ci.LOW,'元减',oi.DISCOUNT_AMT, '元') else p.PROM_DES END ) PROM_DES, p.SALES_ORG, p.SALES_DIST, p.CUSTOMER_TYPE, p.PROM_STAT, p.PLAN_START_TIME, p.PLAN_STOP_TIME, p.BUY_START_TIME, p.BUY_STOP_TIME, p.BUY_AMT, p.GIFT_AMT, oi.DISCOUNT_AMT, ci.LOW from t_promotion p left join t_sys_code_item i on p.PROM_SUB_TYPE = i.ITEM_CODE and i.TYPE_CODE= left join t_promotion_orig_item oi on p.PROM_NO = oi.PROM_NO left join t_promotion_gift_item gi on p.PROM_NO = gi.PROM_NO and oi.item_no = gi.item_no LEFT JOIN t_promotion_con_item ci ON p.PROM_NO = ci.PROM_NO and ci.item_no = oi.item_no LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex a1 ON oi.GOOD_NO = a1.MATNR AND p.SALES_ORG = a1.SALES_ORG LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex a2 ON gi.GIFT_NO = a2.MATNR AND p.SALES_ORG = a2.SALES_ORG left join t_prom_scope_item si on p.PROM_NO = si.PROM_NO left join t_md_mara_ex pro1 on pro1.matnr = oi.GOOD_NO left join t_md_mara_ex pro2 on pro2.matnr = gi.GIFT_NO where 1 = 1 and p.PROM_NO = #{promNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by p.PROM_NO desc
